title: A rainy day, making soup
description:
Our story tonight is called “A rainy day, making soup” and it’s a story about feeling lit up from the inside when it gets dark and gloomy out. It’s also about a drink of something special, a welcome home kiss and falling asleep on the sofa while dinner is being made.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Order the book now! hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

This episode mentions alcohol.

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
